activities: Wilcomp Software LP provides software services for the administration of educational institutions.  Providing these services requires the collection of personal information regarding the educational institution itself.  In turn, our client institutions will collect personal information regarding their staff members, along with the various parties that represent the institution's "customers" (parents, students and other associated parties such as doctors or clergy).
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Third-party arbitration via TRUSTE Safe Harbor dispute resolution services
